author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
According to Trump, what Newsom did to California is akin to what Biden has done to the United States. And because of that, Trump says the mere fact that Newsom even ran for governor should be considered a crime in itself.


REPORTER: What crime has Gavin Newsom committed?

TRUMP: Running for governor. pic.twitter.com/4SVpuqZAgZ
— Townhall.com (@townhallcom) June 9, 2025


That would be an understatement.

Only Progressives can take one of the best states in the country and turn it into things tha
title: Trump tells a smug press what crime he want to have Gavin Newsom to be arrested for, and it’s hilarious

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
According to Democrat Minnesota Rep. Leigh Finke, who also happens to be a man who feels like a woman, we need illegal immigration because they build things, and “White people from the US” have a bad track record when it comes to this.


Democrat Minnesota Rep. Leigh Finke, a man pretending to be a woman, says we need to import more foreign workers because White people don't help grow the economy or build things.pic.twitter.com/QddTtQbKmO
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) June 9, 2025
title: Trans representative rants that America needs more illegals because White people "have a bad track record"

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Well, well, well. What do we have here?

So, while the left wants you to believe the masses prefer 'fiery but mostly peaceful' riots, the numbers just aren’t adding up. Even CNN’s polling analyst shows he has a net approval rating on his handling of illegal immigration.

President Trump’s net approval on immigration has skyrocketed.

Turns out Americans like a president who defends Americans from illegals.pic.twitter.com/oxCoWY6K2O
— Paul A. Szypula 🇺🇸 (@Bubblebathgirl) June 9, 2025


Anyone surprised by this
title: CNN Analyst has data saying Trump's approval on immigration is surging DESPITE CNN's "news' coverage

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Just because you are a father, that does not make you an upstanding illegal, and someone should really inform the left that. Because, for some reason, progressives have it in their little head that the more kids you have, the more of a pass you should get for committing awful crimes. However, that’s not really how federal immigration law tends to work. So, while the left has decided to make Kilmar Abrego Garcia their poster child for illegal immigration solely because he has fathered three children, they have succeeded in uplifting a man who should remain in prison for a very long time.

This is why Border Czar Tom Homan said what needed to be said.
title: Tom Homan To “Maryland Man” Kilmar Abrego Garcia: “When he gets done with his prison sentence, he’s gonna be deported”

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
“Mostly peaceful” riots broke out across Los Angeles over the weekend. While Trump attempted to save the city from its downfall, Governor Gavin Newsom made it clear he was content to let it burn.

Today’s show dives into all of that.

According to the Federation for American Immigration Reform (FAIR):

Mass illegal immigration
title: Watch: Donald Trump Tries to Save Los Angeles While Gavin Newsom Wants it to Burn

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
You’d think setting cars on fire would be the bare minimum threshold for calling a “mostly peaceful protest” a riot, but not when it comes to the mainstream media. According to ABC News, it’s apparently just “a bunch of people having fun watching cars burn.” You know, everyone’s favorite pastime.

If you needed any more justification as to why the media has become largely irrelevant, here it is!

WATCH: ABC News wants you to know what is happening in California isn’t a violent riot.

It’s “just a bunch of people having fun watching cars burn.” — ABC 7’s Marc Brown. pic.twitter.com/xjiQZJyuDq
— Steve Guest (@SteveGuest) Jun
title: ABC News dismisses the LA riots because it’s just a, quote, "bunch of people having fun watching cars burn"

author: Brodigan
description:
Greta Thunberg’s Gaza Mystery Tour stopped before it really got started when her ship was intercepted by the IDF. Los Angeles has a riot problem. People protesting ICE turned violent almost immediately and spent the weekend looting and setting things on fire. But it was mostly peaceful, right? The Big Beautiful Bill continues to face scrutiny. We go over everything it does for the border. Guest Andrew Wilson stops by to talk about his show now on the Rumble Line-up.

WATCH & REACT
title: LA Riots the Sequel:  Trump Tries to Save LA as Gavin Newsom Watches it Burn (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
Over the weekend, Donald Trump's common-sense illegal immigration reform came to Los Angeles, where Democrats did what Democrats do. They rioted, set things on fire, and waved flags from foreign countries. Not that there weren't American Flags there too, but those were set on fire. If you were to create a Venn diagram of "this is why I voted for Trump" and "this is why Democrats lose," it would be a circle.

Here's where things stand as of this morning. The LA Police chief says they are overwhelmed by the invading forces, and could use a little help, even as Gov. Gavin Newsom and Mayor Karen Bass, two California "leaders" known for doing nothing, claim nothing needs to be done.

— (@)
title: As LA burns (again) over illegals, Donald Trump drops a banger quote on bringing law and order whether CA likes it ot not

author: Brodigan
description:
Do you remember two years ago when Ron DeSantis sent fifty illegals to Martha's Vineyard, and it was painted as a humanitarian crisis by the media? That these fifty unauthorized democrats were a strain on the infrastructure of one of the wealthiest (and most liberal) places in America? That was then. Now the left is virtue signalling in the other direction, and Trump deporting Martha's illegals is considered a bad thing.

It never ceases to amaze me just how stupid the media thinks the general public is. And their belief that none of us has memories. Or an internet. Or functioning eyeballs.

To take a trip back, in 2022, DeSantis and Texas Gov. Greg Abbott started helping people seeking asylum find asylum in liberal cities where people boasted "no human being is illegal" and bragged about being sanctuary cities for these imported future Democrats. As it turns out, op
title: Media claims it's a catastrophe that illegals are being deported from Martha's Vineyard, thinks we forgot two years ago
